title: Zoids Wild
synopsis: The series follows Arashi and his Wild Liger. The main antagonists are the Death Metal Empire, lead by Gallagher. They use Zoids for conquest, and have at their command many Zoids and warriors, including the Four Heavenly Kings.
related_anime: ['Zoids Wild Senki', 'Zoids Genesis', 'Zoids Fuzors', 'Zoids', 'Zoids Wild Zero', 'Zoids Shinseiki/Zero', 'Zoids Wild']
